casebody.data:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Petitioner, v. MILLFAY MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Inc., Respondent. No. 161. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 13, 1938. A. Norman Somers, Charles Fahy, General Counsel, Robert B. Watts, Associate General Counsel, and Laurence A. Knapp and Herbert O. Eby, all of Washington, D. C., for petitioner.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court and order of enforcement granted.
